snippet.title: Pyro 2 gameplay (PC Game, 1990)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Pyro 2, Dos PC game produced by Michael O'brien in 1990 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/pyro-2/4243/
Pyro 2 is a perfect game for  pyromaniac player. As you walk, the string trails behind you, burning, setting fire to pools of gasoline from tanks.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Final Frontier - https://youtu.be/q-HwQGgdYJU
Pyro ][ - https://youtu.be/8EOpW06zi8U
Air Force Commander - https://youtu.be/MHfWZbmbYYM
